posts.description:
NEVER TOO YOUNG TO COOK  @belleandbabyblog „Éª„Éª„Éª
Thanks to @annabelkarmel for sending me her complete baby and toddler meal planner and the busy mums cook book üìö their full of amazing ideas ! just tried the Salmon and Broccoli Pasta and Orla approves üë∂üèºüëçüèªüíï #annabelkarmel #babyfood #baby #weaning

EASY SALMON AND COD BURGER

A tasty quick and easy weeknight supper ...Enjoy xx üçãüçãüçãüçã Suitable from one year
Suitable for freezing 
125g salmon fillet, skinned and diced
125g cod fillet, skinned and diced
6 spring onions, chopped
50g Parmesan, grated
1 tbsp tomato ketchup
1 tbsp mayonnaise
30g Panko breadcrumbs

Tartare Sauce
100g mayonnaise
30g gherkins, chopped
2 spring onions, chopped
1 tbsp chopped parsley
A squeeze of lemon juice

6 Mini  buns
6 slices tomato
6 lettuce leaves

1 To make the burgers. Measure all of the ingredients into a food processor and whiz until finely chopped. Shape into 6 burgers.

2 Heat a little oil in a frying pan. Fry the burgers for 3 to 4 minutes each side until lightly golden and cooked through in the middle.

3 Mix all of the ingredients for the tartar sauce together in a small bowl.

4 . Siice the buns in half.  Put a piece of lettuce on top. Put one burger, tomato and tartar sauce on top and press the top of the bun down.

MAKES 6 BURGERS

#annabelkarmel #easyrecipe #salmon #cod #familyfood #quicksupper #fussyeater #kidsfood #recipeoftheday

Our tasty nutritionally balanced chilled meals are on offer until Sunday at Tesco's. Choose from 8 delicious recipes  including  Scrummy Fish Pie , Beef Cottage Pie with Five Veggies and Mild Chicken Tikka Masala .. They taste as good as home made . .. We get so many lovely comments from people who have bought them as not only are they nutritious children love them .. #annabelkarmel #tesco #healthykidsmeals #quickmeals #fussyeater #favouriterecipes #cotagepie #fishpie #lasagne #chickentikkamasala #chickenandpotatopie #quicksupper

BABY PENGUINS

Today is world penguin day and  if you have ever watched March of the Penguins you will know that it's incredible what penguins go through to have a baby.. Emperor penguins incubate their eggs during the long dark southern winter months in freezing weather. A female penguin lays a single egg in May or June. She then passes it over to her mate to incubate and she's off.  She spends the next nine weeks at sea feeding . The  male carefully balances the egg on his feet for between 65 to 75 days to keep it warm and off the snow surface in a specially adapted brood pouch before it hatches . There are some species like the Magelanoc penguins that mate for life.. #annabelkarmel #penguins #funfood

DANCING SPRING ONIONS

It's a new experience here at AK HQ a sort of Disney meets carrot ü•ï sticks .  We are working on some stop animation videos for my new Baby Led Weaning Recipe book which will be published on May 25th .. Just creating some dancing spring onions ... you have to take lots of still photos and then put them all together to get the movement ... All will  be revealed later in our Royal Ballet performance of Swan Lake Sweetcorn Fritters and our Nutcracker Energy Balls x

#annabelkarmel #babyledweaning #weaning #baby #babyfood #stopanimation #baby #fingerfoods

CHICKEN NOODLE SALAD

A delicious healthy salad .  Perfect for you and your little one . A good alternative to sandwiches for lunchboxes and you can prepare it the night before ... 150g egg noodles
100g carrot, grated
25g Spring onions, sliced
50g edamame
100g cooked chicken, diced

Dressing
4 tbsp sunflower oil
1 1/2!tbsp rice wine vinegar
1 tsp honey
2 tbsp sweet chilli sauce 
1/2 tsp fresh ginger, grated
1 tsp soy sauce

1 Mix all of the salad ingredients together.
2 Mix the dressing ingredients , pour over the salad and toss together.

MAKES 4 PORTIONS

#annabelkarmel #salad #healthyrecipe #lunchbox #edamame #recipeoftheday #superfood

It's great when I post a recipe on IG and the same day someone makes it so thank you  @mylittletum for sending me this pic and so happy it was clean plates all round ! „Éª„Éª„Éª
Dinner: {Fruity Chicken Curry}
.
Today we are all about @annabelkarmel and this curry is honestly the most delicious thing you and your kids will ever taste. It's sweet yet tangy, the flavours just work.. see @annabelkarmel's page for the recipe
.
I pulsed the sauce for my kids to break it up a bit and served it with rice, they ate 2 bowls each and there was zero left to freeze ü§î

#annabelkarmel #weaning #babyfood #baby
Feeling of love ‚ù§Ô∏è about the same as when you see the waiter bringing your food in a restaurant .. #annabelkarmel #lovefood #food #love #recipes

FRUITY CHICKEN CURRRY

Kids love a mild curry and this is one of my all time favourites .  It's al made in one pan and very quick and easy so if you haven't decided what to make for supper tonight try this !! Great served with fluffy rice and crisp Poppadums.  I like the poppadums  that you cook yourself . They pop up in the pan in a matter of seconds and are crisp and light and kids love them ..üçéüçèüçéüçè Suitable from one year
Suitable for freezing üçöüçöüçöüçöüçö
3 tbsp sunflower oil
2 chicken breasts, cut into chunks
1 onion, chopped
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 medium apple peeled and thinly sliced
100g baby corn cut into quarters
1 1/2 tbsp korma curry paste (Patak)
1/2 tbsp mango chutney
1 tbsp tomato puree
150ml coconut milk
1 chicken stock cube dissolved in 150ml boiling water
100g frozen peas
A little salt and black pepper

1 Heat 1 tbsp of the oil in a frying pan and stir fry the chicken for about 4 minutes. Remove the chicken and set aside.

2 Heat the remaining oil and saute the onion and garlic for 3 minutes, then add the apple and baby corn and fry for 3 minutes.

3 Add the korma curry paste, mango chutney, tomato puree, coconut milk, chicken stock and chicken pieces and summer for about 12 minutes.

4 Add the frozen pease and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Season to taste.

#annabelkarmel #kidsmeal #toddlerfood #toddler #familyfood #curry #recipeoftheday #quickrecipe #easyrecipe
